message.text: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

steps.name: build, test and lint
steps.run:
npm install
npm run build
npm run lint
npm test

steps.name: enable KVM for linux runners
steps.run:
echo 'KERNEL=="kvm", GROUP="kvm", MODE="0666", OPTIONS+="static_node=kvm"' | sudo tee /etc/udev/rules.d/99-kvm4all.rules
sudo udevadm control --reload-rules
sudo udevadm trigger --name-match=kvm

steps.name: run emulator to generate snapshot for caching

with.pre-emulator-launch-script:
echo "Running pre emulator launch script. Printing the working directory now:"
pwd
